name: From
description:
Strange place, strange girl, strange you. She gives you a mask that saved your life, but her touch is deadly. Explore the world and try to understand it by doing pointless things. Make sure that you are ready before leaving.

This story is originally made to be a comic, but it fits just fine as a game. And with that said, this game would be a bit boring if you don't have the patience to explore the lore of the story. But if you are here for something different and is filled with curiosity while still tolerating a slow paced game, then From will be a good one. Though this game wouldn't take that much time to complete, there are two endings, and it took at least half an hour to finish one. Enjoy.

Explore the maze thoroughly, pay attention to the floor pattern, took a step ahead first, be patient. Make sure that you are ready.

Disclaimer : This game is just a work of fiction and is not intended to offend anyone.
